dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Wavelet and simulated Annealing SliP inversion (WASP). This code uses a
nonlinear simulated annealing inversion method to model slip amplitude,
rake, rupture time, and rise time on a discretized fault plane, finding
the solution that best fits the observations in the wavelet domain.
dependent_to.name: neic-finitefault

dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.
dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip

dependent_to.description: Cloud-native genomic dataframes and batch computing (Python API)
dependent_to.name: py-hail

dependent_to.description: pathlib.Path subclasses for local and cloud bucket storage
dependent_to.name: py-pathy

description: Typer, build great CLIs. Easy to code. Based on Python type hints.
name: py-typer

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
